text:
Uploadcare | https://uploadcare.com | REMOTE | Clientside engineer, full-stack engineer | igor@uploadcare.com

Uploadcare is a File system as a service for web and mobile applications. We handle every step of the file lifecycle, so developers and entrepreneurs could concentrate on what really matter. We have thousands of customers from all the globe, including Universal Music, Indeed, Georgia State University and many more.

We're looking for people who're interested in changing the industry. If you're core contributor to any js or image processing lib, it's a big plus.

For details, just email me
